newsitem.title: USA: Dow index edges to record despite fears of rate hike.
newsitem.headline: Dow index edges to record despite fears of rate hike.

text.p: The Dow Jones industrial average edged into record ground for a second session Tuesday, but the overall market was nervous amid heightened speculation that the Federal Reserve might be planning an interest rate hike.

Based on early and unofficial data, the Dow closed up 5.77 points at 7,085.16, beating Monday's record finish of 7,079.39. In the broader market, advancing issues led declines by a small margin on active volume of 494 million shares on the New York Stock Exchange.
